content.raw: Cool. I'm not quite done yet with the animation,  but the changes I've made since might fix it, so I've pushed them in case you want to find out. Looks like there's a region on the right where both "put the tab back in" and "take the tab out" conditions are satisfied - or more likely, that taking the tab out changes the geometry of the tab bar (I see foo moving to the middle - they're left aligned for me) making the "put it back in" condition immediately satisfied.
content.html: Cool. I'm not quite done yet with the animation, but the changes I've made since might fix it, so I've pushed them in case you want to find out. Looks like there's a region on the right where both "put the tab back in" and "take the tab out" conditions are satisfied - or more likely, that taking the tab out changes the geometry of the tab bar (I see foo moving to the middle - they're left aligned for me) making the "put it back in" condition immediately satisfied.
